Multiple subway lines have resumed service following an incident where a person was struck by a train, while significant snowfall is expected across parts of New York, and Rep. Elise Stefanik is set to announce her bid for governor.

### Risks & Alerts

- Multiple subway lines have resumed service after a person was struck by a train. [↗](https://news.google.?oc=5)
- Significant snow is forecast for parts of New York, with cold temperatures expected in NYC. [↗](https://news.google.?oc=5)
